Description:
The Trifecta of Choice
Impeccably designed and built to reach the highest of expectations, these three brand new townhouses invite the interest from all buyers groups. Situated close to shops and transport, these homes are completed to impressive standards to incorporate welcoming creature comforts like ducted heating and evaporative cooling found on both levels, as well as introducing stunning Spotted Gum engineered flooring and stone bench tops in the kitchen. The choice is yours from the front four bedroom layout which heads the group of three with street frontage, with two bathrooms, to the rear two options which both offer three bedrooms with two bathrooms. Double garages, a crisp white interior, high ceilings, quality Bosch stainless steel appliances, carpeted bedrooms with either built in or walk in robes for the master, along with open plan living and dining, security systems and landscaped gardens with a shed and a water tank are also featured
Insights: First listed on 16 October, this property has been on Domain for 4 days (last updated on 16 October).

Description:
Street front style and single level ease
Smartly rendered and stylishly rejuvenated for eager first homebuyers, a young family or downsizers, the light bathed single level floorplan of this street front home delivers spacious living and entertaining. With nothing to do but enjoy the tasteful modern comforts and neutral palette, displaying large open plan living and dining area characterised by polished timber floorboards that will match any decor. Cook up a storm in the charming Caesarstone kitchen/meals with upright Chef cooker, gas hotplate and smart grey tiled splashback that matches the modern window blinds.
Three sizeable bedrooms with BIRs are accompanied by a bright and uplifting bathroom boasting a freestanding bath for the ultimate wind down.
Outdoor entertaining boasts a pleasant secluded setting with fully fenced, sizeable grassed garden and timber decking for easy BBQs and relaxing on weekends or after work.
Set on its own landscaped allotment with only one other single level home at the rear, this terrific home is a fabulous purchase and investment in this convenient well-connected locale. Minutes to Croydon Main Street shops and eateries and Mooroolbark Plaza. Central to St Julian Eymard PS, Yarra Hills SC and Oxley CC. Catering for leisure and sporting interests, just a short stroll to Charles Allen Reserve and playground and close to Brentwood Park, tennis courts, Aquahub, Kilsyth Centenary Pool and the Wyreena Community Arts Centre. Good connections to public transport and freeway/Eastlink and a short drive to The Yarra Valley wineries and gourmet shops.
Additionally, offering gas heating, quality carpet in all bedrooms, full sized modern laundry, storage and dedicated parking for 2 cars including a single carport with roller door.
Insights: 139 Hull Road, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 184 other 3 bedroom house in Croydon have recently been sold.

Description:
THE ULTIMATE STARTER AT A PINCH ME PRICE!
A short walk from Croydon Main street shops and train station, this neat two bedroom stand-alone unit promises easy lifestyle qualities and convenience. Single level convenience and with its own private north facing rear patio and large backyard, this is the ultimate starter, downsizer or investment. Both bedrooms offer built in robes, the living room has a gas wall heater, a reverse cycle heater/cooler and a ceiling fan, the kitchen features gas cooking and access to the back yard, and the home offers a single carport with an extra car space. Youll never have to pay rent again and you will always enjoy the prime location to Croydon, the local Brewery, coffee shops, train station and shops. This is a great buy without smashing the budget.

Description:
Well-Connected, Effortless Living
Set prominently within a boutique complex of homes, this solidly constructed and beautifully maintained residence provides generous yet easy-care living suited to young families, downsizers and investors.
Behind the brick-veneer faÃ§ade, a refined interior reveals high ceilings and timber-look floors which flow throughout the light-filled living area. Perfect for relaxed entertaining, the connecting kitchen enjoys plenty of preparation and storage space and features a stainless-steel oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher and a breakfast bar.
The dining zone provides access out to the rear courtyard and an expansive paved patio where you can indulge in alfresco dining. Two bedrooms come equipped with robes and are serviced by a neatly-presented bathroom that features a bath, shower and separate WC.
Split-system heating and cooling, Euro laundry and a single auto garage provide an enviable lifestyle.
Set just a brief walk from the bus stop, Croydon Main Street, Wyreena Community Centre, Swinburne TAFE and Croydon Park, and only moments from Eastland and EastLink.

Description:
Complete Lifestyle Package
Delivering contemporary updates and undeniable convenience, this sunlit residence will entice a range of buyers from downsizers and investors to professionals and young families. Completely refreshed and ready to be lived in or leased out, the property is set within a quiet, no-through road and enjoys a prominent street frontage position on a block of well-maintained units. The modern interiors begin with an inviting living zone that's balanced by a spacious meals area and kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances that include a 900mm gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher. Step out to the peaceful courtyard that boasts plenty of space for outdoor entertaining and established vegetable gardens. Comprising two large bedrooms with built-in robes, a sleek bathroom that incorporates a walk-in shower plus a second WC, additional highlights include ducted heating, split-system cooling, brand-new tiled roof, back-to-base security alarm, updated laundry, generous storage options and a single auto garage. Offering a complete lifestyle package and flaunting an exceptional location, leave the car at home and walk to Croydon Train Station, Silcock Reserve, Wyreena Community Arts Centre and Croydon Main Street. Within close proximity to Aquahub, Swinburne TAFE, Eastland and EastLink.
Insights: 6/63-65 Surrey Road East, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Irresistible Character & Convenience
Irresistible character and an incredibly convenient location underpin the immense appeal of this family home on approximately 855sqm. Supremely central to lifestyle amenities, it is a leisurely walk or minutes' drive to buses, the Tarralla Creek Trail, reserves, Arndale and Croydon Central Shopping Centres, Aquahub, Croydon Library, schools, Swinburne University of Technology, Croydon Main Street and Train Station.
- Set beyond a picket fence, the home cuts a charming figure, flaunting a traditional weatherboard exterior
- Inside, it features a flexible split-level floorplan that can be adapted and/or updated to match your style and family arrangements
- Dual living zones cater to formal and casual occasions; including a comfortable lounge and an expansive family/dining room with open fireplace
- A central kitchen rests between the zones; containing Ilve and Miele stainless steel appliances, granite countertops plus plenty of cupboard storage
- Outside, a large covered entertaining area can be enjoyed all year-round and overlooks a huge, secure backyard that children and pets will adore
- Two ground-level bedrooms with built-in wardrobes are serviced by a bright central bathroom
- A private upper-level retreat can be configured as the ultimate parent's or teenager's suite; boasting the space and versatility to be utilised as a combined bedroom, living area and study
- Ample parking is provided courtesy of a tandem double carport and a single lock-up garage
- Comfort and security is assured with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, two air conditioners and an alarm system
- A generous amount of storage completes the home; including a linen press plus dual walk-in under stair cupboards
Insights: 16 Ronald Road, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 184 other 3 bedroom house in Croydon have recently been sold.

Description:
Willow Court | 5574m2 Premier Home Development
Prime, profitable and raring to go, this premium corner block on 5574m2, with all required permits attained for a prestige housing estate is a developer's dream!
Boasting the boutique name 'Willow Court', the council approved subdivision rests within Croydon's elite 'Dress Circle', comprising dual frontage on Mt Dandenong Road and Valentino Drive.
Ready to be brought to life, it comes complete with comprehensive endorsed stamped plans for six boutique prestige residences, each generously allotted on 864sqm.
A charming Tudor cottage currently resides on the block, offering the option of temporary rental income or residency, whilst you get things moving.
It comprises three bedrooms, an office, one bathroom, kitchen with meals area, lounge with open fireplace, sunroom, front and back courtyards, heating, a single carport, several water tanks plus three and four-car garages/workshops (one with a mezzanine) accessed via Valentino Drive.
A remarkable proposition in a prominent position, it reaches parks, buses plus the popular shops, eateries and train stations of Croydon and Ringwood East within minutes. Close to numerous quality schools including Scared Heart and Tinternvale Primary Schools, Tintern and Yarra Valley Grammars, Luther and Aquinas Colleges. Within minutes to Eastland and EastLink.
*An arborist report is available upon request, as are all drawings and permits.
IMPORTANT:
- Open for Inspection Times are subject to change or cancellation without
notice
- ID Required

Description:
GOOD VALUE FIRST HOME, DOWNSIZER OR INVESTMENT
Cute as a button, unexpectedly spacious, one bedroom unit, in a really lovely development with a village feel. A great value first home, downsizer or investment.
Unpack and relax in the good size living area and cook up a storm in the large separate kitchen with dishwasher. Step out from the sunny meals area to the spacious low maintenance paved courtyard, an ideal space to enjoy a cup of tea on a sunny day. The bedroom is serviced by sizable combined bathroom and laundry.
Additional features include gas ducted heating and split system insuring year round climate control, built in robe, linen cupboard, security door and single carport. Offering fabulous low maintenance and convenient living, this sweet home is surrounded by reserves and walking tracks with the Dorset hotel five minutes walk up the road and just a short six minute drive to Main Street Croydon and Croydon station (according to google maps).

Description:
FRESH, MODERN AND INVITING THE IDEAL FIRST HOME
Light filled and lovely, discover this updated three bedroom beauty in a fabulous peaceful court location. Sitting up front and proud on 379m2 (approx.) block with a fresh, modern and inviting vibe, this young at heart property would make a terrific first home.
Unpack and relax in the bright living area with large window overlooking the good size front yard and cook for family and friends in the chic updated kitchen/dining area with on trend two tone cabinetry, stainless steel oven, cooktop and dishwasher and stone benchtops.
Open the sliding door from the dining area to the very private and securely fenced rear yard, ideal for pets and kids to play. With three sizable robed bedrooms, lovely renewed laundry, bathroom and toilet, gas ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling, garden shed and double carport with roller door, this fantastic home is move in ready - not a thing to do.
In a quiet court location surrounded by parks and reserves including Barngeong Reserve just down the road and within strolling distance of Mooroolbark shops and station.

Description:
A SINGLE STOREY STUNNER
Top end quality, size and location, this three bedroom standout home is the last of 3 on the block, offering modern good looks, a large secured backyard, plenty of additional parking and a detached single garage, whilst maintaining a wonderful position, central to Croydon and Mooroolbark shopping and transport options, and having a variety of schooling options close by.
The ideal downsizer, investment or family home, the new owners will enjoy everything about this home, starting with the large master with full size walk-in robe and ensuite with large shower and toilet. Built in robes are featured in the other two bedrooms which share the main bathroom which is well designed for a younger family, featuring a bath and shower and separate toilet.
Tastefully styled and details that make this home so enticing include plantation shutters, hardwood floors, stone bench tops and quality appliances in the kitchen, as well as providing the comfort of ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a fire place.
A single storey stunner with flexible open plan living areas, bathed in natural sunlight featuring north facing windows with access out to the large rear deck and private garden which presents a sensational outdoor space for kids to play or adults to entertain.

Description:
Convenient living or low maintenance investment
Ideally positioned minutes from Croydon Main Street, this appealing two bedroom home is ideal for those looking at a first home, a low maintenance lifestyle, or investment opportunity.
Surprisingly spacious and flooded with natural light, the living & meal rooms lead through to a fresh modern kitchen with plenty of storage and a centrally placed breakfast bar. A full laundry links the kitchen with a neat rear courtyard with garage access. Low maintenance and neat as a pin, the backyard is ideal for small pets, young children, or has the space to please any gardening enthusiast. Both bedrooms include generous built-in robes and provide easy access to the central bathroom with separate w/c. Central ducted heating and cooling throughout the house and additional heating and cooling options in the main living spaces ensure that climate comfortability is within your control.
Leave the car at home with an easy walk to Croydon shopping, cafes and Croydon train station. Plus easy access to Mt Dandenong Road, Maroondah Highway and Eastlink means this is both a convenient and comfortable place to live with easy access to all the area has to offer.
- Bright, fresh and neutral tones throughout
- Spacious living room with plenty of natural light
- Updated contemporary kitchen
- Tidy rear courtyard for low maintenance living
- Separate meals area
- Single garage with remote control door and extra space for storage or small workbench
- Two very spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
- Location ideal for Main Street and public transport access.
- Ducted heating and cooling for climate comfortability
Insights: 1/206-208 Dorset Road, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
LIGHT SPACE AND POSITION PERFECT
Ideally situated within walking distance to the cosmopolitan Main Street Croydon shopping precinct, public transport, parks and quality schools this property offers a prime opportunity for the first home buyer/investor. Situated on (769m2 approx) the modest three bedroom, one bathroom home, with some improvements, provides a blank canvas to make it your own. With hard wood timber floors enhancing the home, the spacious kitchen provides ample space to combine a meals area. The family bathroom has been updated and the three bedrooms are complete with robes. Outdoors the large rear deck provides a great space for entertaining amongst established gardens and the addition of the single garage is ideal for a work shop facility.
Call today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Opportunity Knocks
Potential packed on a sprawling flat block of 1249sqm (approx.), this four bedroom home will inspire those considering a bespoke renovation or new build project (subject to council approval). Featuring a classic weatherboard faÃ§ade, use your creative flair to reinvigorate the spacious floorplan offering dual living, a central bathroom and second toilet plus a double garage and carport. Alternatively, maximise the value of this prime land with a considered development to meet demand for brand new low maintenance luxury (STCA). Ideally zoned for Ruskin Park Primary School and Yarra Hills Secondary College, this premium parcel is conveniently located near Croydons vibrant shopping, dining and transport hub with easy access to Churinga Shopping Centre and Dorset Golf Course.
All Inspections are By Appointment only. Please provide us your phone number so our agents can contact you.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing Agent
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance at the inspection, including PhilipWebb staff
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Building opportunity in the heart of Croydon
Here is your opportunity to purchase approximately 586sqm of central Croydon land. Offering lifestyle excellence within an established neighbourhood, its prime position allows access to Croydon Central Shopping Centre, Croydon Main Street, Primary School, train station and bus interchange within walking distance.
- Quiet rear block position
- Vacant and ready to go
- Skip the lengthy council waiting periods and start building
- Utilise approved plans and permits for a single storey dwelling
- With three bedrooms, two bathrooms, double garage and alfresco entertaining
- Option to submit your own plans if preferred (STCA)
- Design and construct your dream family home (STCA)
- Shop or dine at a great selection of nearby precincts
- Relish close proximity to Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar
- Appreciate a short commute to Eastland and Eastlink freeway

Description:
Luxe New Living in the Heart of Croydon
Inspections will be held onsite at 14 Lusher Road, Croydon.
Designed for discerning modern tastes, this latest townhouse development brings low maintenance luxury to the heart of Croydon. A superior lifestyle choice or lucrative investment, the complex reaches buses, parks, trails, Arndale Shopping Centre, Aquahub, Croydon Library, schools, Swinburne University of Technology, Croydon Train Station, Main Street shops and eateries on foot. A quick, one main road commute to Eastland and the EastLink freeway.
- Take your pick from three double storey residences
- Comprising three bedrooms and two bathrooms
- Downstairs master bedrooms boasting walk-in robes and en suites
- Open living/meals zones extending out to paved alfresco areas
- Upstairs retreats in all townhouses
- Kitchens with quality appliances and Caesarstone benchtops
- Remote double garage or carport
- Stylish carpets, floorboards and tiling throughout
- Ducted heating, vacuum and cooling plus instantaneous hot water
- Landscaped garden surrounds

Description:
OFFERS CLOSING WEDNESDAY 5TH AUGUST AT 5.00 PM
A lifestyle property with the lot, this sprawling 6-bedroom residence presents a life of luxury and seclusion, in a 5-star location that reaches the area's finest schools and amenities on foot.
Fronted by a rendered facade and freshly planted gardens, it has an expansive single-level floorplan that has been effortlessly extended and renovated to accommodate an expanding family.
A superior level of comfort is supplied from the outset, where six robed bedrooms (two with built-in study desks) are serviced by three lavish floor-to-ceiling tiled bathrooms with single or dual-basin stone-top vanities.
Expertly zoned for relaxation, recreation and entertaining, it showcases connecting family and rumpus rooms with twin skylights and Velux blinds, complemented by an open plan kitchen, living and dining domain with a wood log fireplace. Exquisitely appointed, the kitchen contains dual Miele ovens (one pyrolytic), a 900mm Miele gas stove with wok burner, a Miele dishwasher, Qasair rangehood, soft close drawers, metallic glass splashbacks, an auto-lit butler's pantry, Zip HydroTap (hot, cold and sparking water) plus a quartz stone waterfall-edge breakfast bar.
Flaunting an enviable indoor-outdoor flow, a large sliding stacker door opens to a covered all-seasons entertaining domain, featuring lighting, dual ceiling fans, a stacked-stone-wrapped fireplace, outdoor kitchen with a sink and 4-burner barbeque plus a Ziptrack blind.
The surrounding low-maintenance gardens form a tranquil backdrop to unwind, hosting a solar-heated swimming pool and cubby house for () family fun.
Offering something for the tradesman or car enthusiast, it boasts an internal-access remote 4-car garage with a second laundry, toilet, storage, a wood log fireplace and rear roll-through, supplemented by a gated side parking area that will easily accommodate a trailer or leisure vehicle.
A long list of quality extras add further allure, including a laundry that doubles as a drying room, dual ducted heating and evaporative cooling systems, an alarm, dual garden and firewood sheds, a 10,000L water tank, sprinklers plus liberal amounts of storage throughout.
Feature-packaged and positioned to please, this lavish family property rests within walking distance to buses, Lipscombe Park Kindergarten, trails, McAdam Square, Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Only a short commute to Croydon Main Street and Train Station, Eastland and EastLink.
Insights: 17 Melton Grove, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020.
